metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6010 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in icoutils 0.31.1. A buffer overflow was observed in the "extract_icons" function in the "extract.c" source file. This issue can be triggered by processing a corrupted ico file and will result in an icotool crash.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6010` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

icoutils - 0.31.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icoutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.31.2-1').
